segments.text: I'm observing this kitchen, and frankly, I'm quite flummoxed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is a waterfall, pouring relentlessly onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spreading, soaking into the cabinet doors and creating a dangerous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the woman continues to polish that plate with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged in the water, and she gives no indication of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infuriating to watch such obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is just baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This will certainly lead to water damage if not addressed soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me quite frustrated to see such a clear problem ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR
